languages.text: "Нам претит идти против законов чести, однако видеть противника в вашем лице мы желаем еще меньше. Ради сохранения нейтралитета между нашими династиями — мы согласны на ваше условие".

traits.locale_text: "Нам претит идти против законов чести, однако видеть противника в вашем лице мы желаем еще меньше. Ради сохранения нейтралитета между нашими династиями — мы даем положительный ответ".

languages.text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."
languages.original_text: "Нам претит идти против законов чести, однако видеть противника в вашем лице мы желаем еще меньше. Ради сохранения нейтралитета между нашими династиями — мы согласны на ваше условие".

traits.locale_text: "We loathe to go against the laws of honor, but having you as an adversary is something we'd enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your condition."
"We loathe to go against the laws of honor, but having you as an adversary is something we'd enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your condition."
"We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."
"We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."
"We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

languages.text: “我们不愿违背荣誉的法则，但我们更不愿与您为敌。为了我们的王朝之间能继续保持中立关系，我们愿意接受您的条件。”
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: “我们不愿违背荣誉的法则，但我们更不愿与您为敌。为了我们的王朝之间能继续保持中立关系，我们愿意接受您的条件。”

languages.text: «Odiamos vulnerar las leyes del honor, pero tenerle como enemig{mf|o|a} sería aún peor. Por el bien de la neutralidad entre nuestras casas, aceptaré sus condiciones».
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: «Odiamos vulnerar las leyes del honor, pero tenerle como enemig{mf|o|a} sería aún peor. Por el bien de la neutralidad entre nuestras casas, aceptaré sus condiciones».

languages.text: 「我々は名誉ある法に背くことを好まないが、あなた方を敵に回すことは、我々にとってさらに好ましくないことだ。両王朝の中立のため、貴君の条件に同意する」
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は名誉ある法に背くことを好まないが、あなた方を敵に回すことは、我々にとってさらに好ましくないことだ。両王朝の中立のため、貴君の条件に同意する」

languages.text: "Wir lehnen es ab, die Gesetze der Ehre zu missachten, aber Euch {mf|zum Gegner|zur Gegnerin} zu haben, wäre noch schlimmer. Zum Wohle der Neutralität zwischen unseren Dynastien akzeptieren wir Eure Bedingungen."
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: "Wir lehnen es ab, die Gesetze der Ehre zu missachten, aber Euch {mf|zum Gegner|zur Gegnerin} zu haben, wäre noch schlimmer. Zum Wohle der Neutralität zwischen unseren Dynastien akzeptieren wir Eure Bedingungen."

languages.text: « Nous ne nous réjouissons guère de devoir bafouer les règles de l'honneur, mais nous ne souhaitons pas risquer de vous compter au nombre de nos ennemis. Pour préserver la neutralité entre nos deux dynasties, nous acceptons vos conditions. »
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne nous réjouissons guère de devoir bafouer les règles de l'honneur, mais nous ne souhaitons pas risquer de vous compter au nombre de nos ennemis. Pour préserver la neutralité entre nos deux dynasties, nous acceptons vos conditions. »

languages.text: "Onur kurallarının dışına çıkmaktan nefret etsek de sizi düşman edinmek, bizim için daha da kötü olur. Hanedanlıklarımız arasında bir çatışma yaşanmaması adına şartlarınızı kabul ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We are loath to flout the laws of honour, but having you as an adversary is something we would enjoy even less. For the sake of neutrality between our dynasties, we agree to your terms."

traits.locale_text: "Onur kurallarının dışına çıkmaktan nefret ediyoruz ancak sizin gibi bir düşman edinmek bizim için daha da olumsuz olurdu. Hanedanlıklarımız arasında bir çatışma yaşanmaması adına şartlarınızı kabul ediyoruz."
